name: Forest Marauder
description: The Forest Marauder is a large giant with chaotic features, embodying chaotic evil. It is equipped with natural armor and wields a Boar Spear.
memorable: Unique for its ambush tactics and powerful melee attacks in forested terrain.
goals: To hunt and ambush adventurers in its forest territory.
relations: Related to other giants and may serve as a leader among forest-dwelling creatures.
strengths: Excels at stealth in forest environments and has powerful melee attacks.
weaknesses: Sunlight Sensitivity, leading to reduced effectiveness in bright light.
attacks: Employs devastating Boar Spear attacks and can throw rocks at range.
most_powerful_ability: Forest Camouflage, allowing it to hide easily in wooded terrain.
senses: Has darkvision up to 120 feet, enhancing its ability to detect creatures in low light.
skills: Boasts a Stealth skill, making it proficient in hiding.
additional_information: Can perform a Multiattack with two Boar Spear strikes.
Forest Ambusher allows enhanced hiding in forests.
Strength score of 21 gives it impressive physical power.
Sunlight Sensitivity imposes disadvantages in direct sunlight.
Capable of pushing targets away with successful melee attacks.
test_queries: forest giant that attacks unsuspecting prey
powerful melee giant hiding in woods
